application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3 part C (Submission of details - Drawings of profile, cross section and elevation) of listed building consent 21/02931 (Reconfiguration of flat 2 at first floor level and flat 4 at second floor level following  insertion of an internal staircase to rear of property, and provision of a 1x1 bed unit at second floor level following the subdivision at flat 4 with associated internal alterations. Externally, the proposals seek to infill the non-original window on second floor in brick and mortar to match the colour of the existing, and refurbishment and replacement of relevant windows as existing, and replacement of French doors to the rear as existing)   .
